basic.description: This course is an introduction to politics in Korea, Taiwan, and Japan. Looks at twentieth century political developments to better understand contemporary events in these countries. Deals with political issues such as electoral systems, party systems, "economic miracles", the process of democratization, the potential future role of these countries in world affairs, North Korean nuclear development, and unification of the Korean Peninsula.
basic.subject: CPO
basic.title: Emerging Democracies in Northeast Asia: Korea, Taiwan, Japan
